duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain and repair a diverse range of equipment including delivery vehicles, heavy duty machinery, on road tractors, and trailers from a variety of manufacturers.
Troubleshoot and maintain/repair various systems including hydraulic brakes, air brakes, electronics, and engines.
Perform other maintenance tasks as requested.

education_certification.credential: Must be a U.S. Citizen or National of the U.S., an alien lawfully admitted for permanent residence, or an alien authorized to work in the U.S. for this employer.
